text: Yara bahukhodabadi tara takhana balabe -- ''allah yadi iccha karatena tabe amara ansi damra karatama na, ara amadera pitrpurusara'o na, ara amara kichu'i nisedha karatama na.’’ E'ibhabe edera purbe yara chila tara'o pratyakhyana karechila, ye paryanta na tara amadera ksamata asbada karechila! Balo -- ''tomadera kache ki kono jnana rayeche? Thakale ta amadera nikata hajira karo. Tomara sudhu kalpanara'i anusarana karacho, ara tomara to sudhu andaje hataraccha.’’
